eLabel.text: F i l e l i s t
P l a y l i s t

{"templates": {"default": (50,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 1), size = (605, 24), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 25), size = (605, 24), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 2 is the description MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (640, 0), size = (48, 48), png = 5), # index 5 is the status pixmap MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (0, 49), size = (640, 2), png = 6), # index 6 is the div pixmap ]), "category": (40,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 0), size = (605, 22), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 20), size = (605, 18), font=2, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the description MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (0, 38), size = (640, 2), png = 3), # index 3 is the div pixmap ]) }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20),gFont("Regular", 18),gFont("Regular", 16)], "itemHeight": 50 }

{"templates": {"default": (25, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 0), size = (50, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (90, 0), size = (70, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (190, 0), size = (160, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (350, 0), size = (160, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (570, 0), size = (120, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], True, "showNever"), "notselected": (25, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 0), size = (50, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (90, 0), size = (70, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (190, 0), size = (160, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (350, 0), size = (160, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (570, 0), size = (120, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], False, "showNever") }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20), gFont("Regular", 20)], "itemHeight": 25 }

screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: # this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() # y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 80, textsize[1] + 80) offset = 20 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 80 wsizex = textsize[0] + 80 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (600 > wsizex): wsizex = 600 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) # resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) # resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) # move list listsize = (wsizex - 20, 50) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) # center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))

screen.name: MessageBoxSimple
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 50, textsize[1] + 20) wsizex = textsize[0] + 60 wsizey = textsize[1] if (64 > wsizey): wsizey = 64 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: wsizey += 60 if (280 > wsizex): wsizex = 280 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: listsize = (wsizex-4, 50) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(2, wsizey-52)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))

screen.name: VuplusAuthenticity
screen.title: Return the Love Event (only for genuine box)

{"templates": {"default": (100,[ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (10, 12), size = (100, 75), png = 4), # index 4 is the thumbnail MultiContentEntryText(pos = (120, 10), size = (510, 25), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 1), # index 1 is the Title MultiContentEntryText(pos = (120, 40), size = (300, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 5), # index 5 is the Published Date MultiContentEntryText(pos = (120, 70), size = (300, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 6), # index 6 is the Views Count MultiContentEntryText(pos = (420, 40), size = (200, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 7), # index 7 is the duration MultiContentEntryText(pos = (420, 70), size = (200, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 8), # index 8 is the ratingcount ]), "state": (100,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 10), size = (600, 28), font=2, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 40), size = (600, 50), font=3, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 1), # index 2 is the description ]) }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 22),gFont("Regular", 18),gFont("Regular", 26),gFont("Regular", 20)], "itemHeight": 100 }

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 3), size = (210, 24), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (230, 3), size = (160, 24), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 2), # index 2 is the state MultiContentEntryProgress(pos = (400, 3), size = (110, 24), percent = -3), # index 3 should be progress MultiContentEntryText(pos = (520, 3), size = (110, 24), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 4), # index 4 is the percentage ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 22),gFont("Regular", 18)], "itemHeight": 30 }
